name: 30 Gallon Flammable Safety Cabinet, Industrial Yellow Steel Storage for Flammable Liquids, Fireproof Double-Wall Design with 2 Adjustable Shelves, Manual Close Doors & Dual Vents, OSHA Compliant
short_description: [Fireproof Double-Wall Steel Design] - This flammable safety cabinet features a 1.5" air gap between cold-rolled steel walls for maximum fire resistance. Ideal for industrial flammable liquid storage in labs, garages, and factories.

[Rugged Galvanized Steel Construction] - Built from heavy-duty galvanized steel, this OSHA-approved flammable storage cabinet resists dents, rust, and harsh chemicals—perfect for storing alcohol, gasoline, solvents, and glue safely.

[Manual-Close Self-Latching Doors] - Equipped with a fail-safe 3-point self-latching system and continuous piano hinges, this hazardous material storage cabinet closes securely every time. Includes lockable doors and key for added safety.

[Comprehensive Safety Features] - Includes dual flame arrestor vents, grounding wire connector, adjustable leveling feet, and chemical-resistant powder-coated finish. This fireproof chemical cabinet offers reliable protection and OSHA compliance.

[Certified for Industrial Use] - This 30 gallon yellow flammable cabinet meets international safety standards (ROHS, explosion-proof). Suitable for commercial, lab, garage, and shop use to store flammable materials securely.
product_description: Ensure safe and compliant flammable liquid storage with this 30 gallon yellow safety cabinet, designed for industrial and commercial environments. Constructed with double-wall cold-rolled galvanized steel and a 1.5-inch air gap, it provides excellent fire protection. The manual-close doors use a 3-point latching system and continuous piano hinges for secure closure. With two adjustable shelves, flame arrestor vents, a grounding connector, and rust- and chemical-resistant powder coating, this fireproof cabinet is ideal for storing gasoline, alcohol, solvents, or banana oil. OSHA- and ROHS-certified, it's perfect for labs, workshops, or job sites needing reliable flammable storage.

short_description: 🔵 CORROSION-RESISTANT CONSTRUCTION--Specially engineered with corrosion-resistant materials and a chemical-resistant powder-coat finish to withstand exposure to acids, bases, and other corrosive chemicals. 🧪 VAPOR-TIGHT SEALING SYSTEM--Features a continuous liquid-tight door seal and vapor-proof construction that minimizes the release of harmful chemical fumes into your workspace. This protective sealing system helps maintain air quality and reduces exposure to dangerous vapors from acids and solvents.

🛡️ FULLY WELDED LEAK-CONTAINMENT DESIGN--Built with a heavy-duty 2-inch leak-proof sump that securely contains spills and accidental leaks. The fully welded, rivet-free construction provides superior structural integrity, preventing corrosive liquids from damaging your floors and work environment.

🔧 CHEMICAL-RESISTANT COMPONENTS--Equipped with acid-resistant shelves and fittings designed to withstand corrosive environments. The adjustable galvanized steel shelves feature a protective coating and lipped edges to direct spills safely toward the containment sump.

⚙️ OSHA & SAFETY COMPLIANCE READY--Manufactured to meet OSHA 29 CFR 1910.106 and EPA requirements for safe chemical storage. This cabinet provides the compliant storage solution you need for nitric acid, sulfuric acid, hydrogen peroxide, and other corrosive chemicals commonly used in industrial and laboratory .
